name: google-image-search
title: Google Image Search
description: This extension uses the Google API to search for images and allows you to download or copy them to your clipboard quickly!
author: krod12

commands.name: google-search-images
commands.title: Google Search Images
commands.description: Search images using the Google API and download or copy them

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
